member.name: M:CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.AppBuilderExtensions.UseMauiCommunityToolkitCore(Microsoft.Maui.Hosting.MauiAppBuilder,System.Action{CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.Options})
member.summary: Initializes the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit Core Library
member.returns: initialized for

member.name: M:CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.Extensions.ColorConversionExtensions.ToRgbString(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color)
member.summary: Converts this to a containing the red, green and blue components.
member.returns: A in the format: RGB(red,green,blue) where red, green and blue will be a value between 0 and 255. (e.g. RGB(255,0,0) for ).

member.name: M:CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.Extensions.ColorConversionExtensions.ToRgbaString(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts this to a containing the red, green, blue and alpha components.
member.returns: A in the format: RGBA(red,green,blue,alpha) where red, green and blue will be a value between 0 and 255, and alpha is a value between 0 and 1. (e.g. RGBA(255,0,0,1) for ).

member.name: M:CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.Extensions.ColorConversionExtensions.ToCmykString(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color)
member.summary: Converts this to a containing the cyan, magenta, yellow and key components.
member.returns: A in the format: CMYK(cyan,magenta,yellow,key) where cyan, magenta, yellow and key will be a value between 0% and 100%. (e.g. CMYK(0%,100%,100%,0%) for ).

member.name: M:CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.Extensions.ColorConversionExtensions.ToCmykaString(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts this to a containing the cyan, magenta, yellow, key and alpha components.
member.returns: A in the format: CMYKA(cyan,magenta,yellow,key,alpha) where cyan, magenta, yellow and key will be a value between 0% and 100% and alpha will be a value between 0 and 1. (e.g. CMYKA(100%,100%,0%,100%,1) for ).

member.name: M:CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.Extensions.ColorConversionExtensions.ToHslString(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color)
member.summary: Converts this to a containing the hue, saturation and lightness components.
member.returns: A in the format: HSL(hue,saturation,lightness) where hue will be a value between 0 and 360, and saturation and lightness will be a value between 0% and 100%. (e.g. HSL(0,100%,50%) for ).

member.name: M:CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.Extensions.ColorConversionExtensions.ToHslaString(Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts this to a containing the hue, saturation, lightness and alpha components.
member.returns: A in the format: HSLA(hue,saturation,lightness,alpha) where hue will be a value between 0 and 360, saturation and lightness will be a value between 0% and 100%, and alpha will be a value between 0 and 1. (e.g. HSLA(0,100%,50%,1) for ).

member.summary: Toggles multi-line mode. When true, multiple lines can be drawn on the while the tap/click is released in-between lines. Note: when is also enabled, the lines are cleared after the tap/click is released. Additionally, will be fired after each line that is drawn.

member.name: P:CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core.IDrawingView.ShouldClearOnFinish
member.summary: Indicates whether the is cleared after releasing the tap/click and a line is drawn. Note: when is also enabled, this might cause unexpected behavior.
